cont.entity_a: Rough adjustment release lock is under the collar lock and is difficult to adjust. Fine adjustment sticks. Body does not slide smoothly in the collar. Very prone to becoming hard to adjust vertically due to wood dust accumulation. Retainer snap ring on the vertical adjustment shaft has broken twice. Easy to adjust height and change bits without getting under the table. Easy depth adjustment and solid wrenches included.

Powerful, quiet, and versatile. Router is powerful and has a variable speed feature (8,000-25,000 RPMs). Router is capable of producing 2.25 HP of mechanical energy while consuming 1.93 HP of electrical energy. Soft start and variable speed are beneficial features. The router runs well and does not overheat.
Router was easy to install and fit perfectly on the router table base.
cont.entity_b: Difficult to install initially due to existing DSL modem router functions.

cont.entity_a: The router is durable and of good quality. Well-constructed and functional.

cont.entity_b: Extremely stable with a fantastic range. Works great with Xbox Live and Nintendo Wi-Fi after firmware upgrade. Supports stronger WiFi encryption for wireless access points. Fast and reliable with advanced settings. Solid signal and reliable performance. Great router for gaming with Xbox Live. Handles a lot of connections without slowing down. Works well with a variety of devices including gaming consoles. Good signal strength and does not drop connection. Handles heavy internet traffic without losing reception.
Customer service is very helpful for setup.
Easy to set up and configure. Router works well after resolving setup issues.

cont.entity_a: Soft start is softer than older Freud router rated at the same power. Comes with both 1/4" and 1/2" chucks. The depth locks in channels and changes are made with a side dial. The collet grips the bit well, and the bit does not walk in the chuck.
cont.entity_b: Game Fuel feature supports VOIP nicely. Gigabit switch is a real plus.
Overheated when stacked under a Dlink Switch.
